name: Cyclops Warlock
senses: Can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical 120 ft., Passive Perception 8

traits.name: Beast Speech
traits.desc: The cyclops warlock can cast speak with animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The cyclops warlock is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, true strike * 1st-2nd level (2 slots): darkness, expeditious retreat, find familiar, hex, mirror image

traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
traits.desc: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
